verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> she-mu-'El And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, unto all Israel הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ti Behold I have hearkened בְקֹֽלְכֶ֔ם <WH6963> ve-ko-le-Chem, unto your voice לְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> le-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- you אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> 'a-mar-Tem in all that ye said לִ֑י Li; וָאַמְלִ֥יךְ <WH4427> va-'am-Lich unto me and have made עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> Me-lech. a king

וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> hin-Neh here הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ׀ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech And now behold the king מִתְהַלֵּ֣ךְ <WH1980> mit-hal-Lech walketh לִפְנֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Chem, before וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I am זָקַ֣נְתִּי <WH2204> za-Kan-ti you and I am old וָשַׂ֔בְתִּי <WH7867> va-Sav-ti, and grayheaded וּבָנַ֖י <WH1121> u-va-Nai and behold my sons הִנָּ֣ם <WH2009> hin-Nam and behold אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> 'it-te-Chem; for וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I הִתְהַלַּ֣כְתִּי <WH1980> hit-hal-Lach-ti [are] with you and I have walked לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Chem, before מִנְּעֻרַ֖י <WH5271> min-ne-'u-Rai you from my childhood עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- even הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. to this

הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold עֲנ֣וּ <WH6030> 'a-Nu Behold here I [am] witness בִי֩ vi נֶ֨גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged before יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh against me before the LORD וְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> ve-Ne-ged before מְשִׁיח֗וֹ <WH4899> me-shi-Cho, and before his anointed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שׁוֹר֩׀ <WH7794> shOr whose ox מִ֨י <WH4310> mi Whose לָקַ֜חְתִּי <WH3947> la-Kach-ti have I taken וַחֲמ֧וֹר <WH2543> va-cha-Mor ;or whose ass מִ֣י <WH4310> mi whose לָקַ֗חְתִּי <WH3947> la-Kach-ti, have I taken וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִ֤י <WH4310> mi whom עָשַׁ֙קְתִּי֙ <WH6231> 'a-Shak-ti ;or whom have I defrauded אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִ֣י <WH4310> mi whose רַצּ֔וֹתִי <WH7533> ratz-Tzo-ti, ;whom have I oppressed וּמִיַּד־ <WH3027> u-mi-yad- ;or of whose hand מִי֙ <WH4310> mi Whose לָקַ֣חְתִּי <WH3947> la-Kach-ti taken כֹ֔פֶר <WH3724> Cho-fer, have I received [any] bribe וְאַעְלִ֥ים <WH5956> ve-'a'-Lim to blind עֵינַ֖י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai mine eyes בּ֑וֹ bo; וְאָשִׁ֖יב <WH7725> ve-'a-Shiv therewith;and I will restore לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, And they said לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo have not עֲשַׁקְתָּ֖נוּ <WH6231> 'a-shak-Ta-nu Thou hast not defrauded וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo or רַצּוֹתָ֑נוּ <WH7533> ratz-tzo-Ta-nu; us nor oppressed וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- or לָקַ֥חְתָּ <WH3947> la-Kach-ta us neither hast thou taken מִיַּד־ <WH3027> mi-yad- hand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish of any man's מְאֽוּמָה׃ <WH3972> me-'U-mah. ought

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem about עֵ֧ד <WH5707> 'ed [is] witness יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto them The LORD בָּכֶ֗ם ba-Chem, וְעֵ֤ד <WH5707> ve-'Ed [is] witness מְשִׁיחוֹ֙ <WH4899> me-shi-Cho against you and his anointed הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֧א <WH3808> lo not מְצָאתֶ֛ם <WH4672> me-tza-Tem that ye have not found בְּיָדִ֖י <WH3027> be-ya-Di in my hand מְא֑וּמָה <WH3972> me-'U-mah; ought וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And they answered עֵֽד׃ <WH5707> 'Ed. [He is] witness פ Peh

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; unto the people יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [It is] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> 'a-Sah that advanced אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron וַאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher and who הֶעֱלָ֛ה <WH5927> he-'e-Lah up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> 'a-vo-tei-Chem your fathers מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, now הִֽתְיַצְּב֛וּ <WH3320> hit-yatz-tze-Vu Now therefore stand still וְאִשָּׁפְטָ֥ה <WH8199> ve-'ish-sha-fe-Tah that I may reason אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> 'it-te-Chem concerning לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei with you before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; God אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all צִדְק֣וֹת <WH6666> tzid-Kot of all the righteous acts יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah which he did אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> 'it-te-Chem concerning וְאֶת־ <WH854> ve-'Et concerning אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem. to you and to your fathers

כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ka-'a-Sher- after בָּ֥א <WH935> ba was come יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko When Jacob מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; into Egypt וַיִּזְעֲק֤וּ <WH2199> vai-yiz-'a-Ku cried אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem and your fathers אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh then the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron וַיּוֹצִ֤יאוּ <WH3318> vai-yo-Tzi-'u which brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> 'a-vo-tei-Chem your fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt וַיֹּשִׁב֖וּם <WH3427> vai-yo-shi-Vum and made them dwell בַּמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

וַֽיִּשְׁכְּח֖וּ <WH7911> vai-yish-ke-Chu And when they forgat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their God וַיִּמְכֹּ֣ר <WH4376> vai-yim-Kor he sold אֹתָ֡ם <WH853> 'o-Tam בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> be-Yad them into the hand סִֽיסְרָא֩ <WH5516> si-se-Ra of Sisera שַׂר־ <WH8269> sar- captain צְבָ֨א <WH6635> tze-Va of the host חָצ֜וֹר <WH2674> cha-Tzor of Hazor וּבְיַד־ <WH3027> u-ve-yad- and into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וּבְיַד֙ <WH3027> u-ve-Yad and into the hand מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech of the king מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> mo-'Av, of Moab וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu and they fought בָּֽם׃ Bam.

וַיִּזְעֲק֤וּ <WH2199> vai-yiz-'a-Ku And they cried אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD; וַיֹּאמֶר vai-yo-mer כוַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru answer קחָטָ֔אנוּ <WH2398> cha-Ta-nu, We have sinned כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki because עָזַ֙בְנוּ֙ <WH5800> 'a-Zav-nu because we have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD וַנַּעֲבֹ֥ד <WH5647> van-na-'a-Vod and have served אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <WH1168> hab-be-'a-Lim Baalim וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָעַשְׁתָּר֑וֹת <WH6252> ha-'ash-ta-Rot; and Ashtaroth וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, now הַצִּילֵ֛נוּ <WH5337> hatz-tzi-Le-nu but now deliver מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> mi-Yad us out of the hand אֹיְבֵ֖ינוּ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-nu of our enemies וְנַעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5647> ve-na-'av-De-ka. and we will serve

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרֻבַּ֣עַל <WH3378> ye-rub-Ba-'al Jerubbaal וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּדָ֔ן <WH917> be-Dan, and Bedan וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יִפְתָּ֖ח <WH3316> yif-Tach and Jephthah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El; and Samuel וַיַּצֵּ֨ל <WH5337> vai-yatz-Tzel and delivered אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> 'et-Chem מִיַּ֤ד <WH3027> mi-Yad you out of the hand אֹֽיְבֵיכֶם֙ <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Chem of your enemies מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> mis-sa-Viv, on every side וַתֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> vat-te-she-Vu and ye dwelled בֶּֽטַח׃ <WH983> Be-tach. safe

וַתִּרְא֗וּ <WH7200> vat-tir-'U, And when ye saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that נָחָ֞שׁ <WH5176> na-Chash that Nahash מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children עַמּוֹן֮ <WH5983> 'am-mOn of Ammon בָּ֣א <WH935> ba came עֲלֵיכֶם֒ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem against וַתֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> vat-To-me-ru against you ye said לִ֔י Li, לֹ֕א <WH3808> lo No כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- but מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech unto me Nay but a king יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> yim-Loch shall reign עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu; over וַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh over us when the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God מַלְכְּכֶֽם׃ <WH4428> mal-ke-Chem. [was] your king

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, Now הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> hin-Neh here הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech Now therefore behold the king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you בְּחַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH977> be-char-Tem whom ye have chosen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you שְׁאֶלְתֶּ֑ם <WH7592> she-'el-Tem; [and] whom ye have desired וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> na-Tan hath set יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and behold the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> Me-lech. a king

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If תִּֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> ti-re-'U If ye will fear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֤ם <WH5647> va-'a-vad-Tem and serve אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To וּשְׁמַעְתֶּ֣ם <WH8085> u-she-ma'-Tem him and obey בְּקֹל֔וֹ <WH6963> be-ko-Lo, his voice וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo and not תַמְר֖וּ <WH4784> tam-Ru and not rebel אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- against פִּ֣י <WH6310> pi against the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וִהְיִתֶ֣ם <WH1961> vih-yi-Tem then גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- both אַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> 'at-Tem, you וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- and also הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech then shall both ye and also the king אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach that reigneth עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem, over אַחַ֖ר <WH310> 'a-Char over you continue following יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- If לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo you will not תִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> tish-me-'U But if ye will not obey בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וּמְרִיתֶ֖ם <WH4784> u-me-ri-Tem but rebel אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- against פִּ֣י <WH6310> pi against the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְהָיְתָ֧ה <WH1961> ve-ha-ye-Tah then יַד־ <WH3027> yad- then shall the hand יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בָּכֶ֖ם ba-Chem וּבַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> u-va-'a-vo-tei-Chem. be against you as [it was] against your fathers

גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- Now therefore עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> 'at-Tah now הִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <WH3320> hit-yatz-tze-Vu stand וּרְא֔וּ <WH7200> u-re-'U, and see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> had-da-Var thing הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol this great הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, which the LORD עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh will do לְעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> le-'ei-nei-Chem. before your eyes
